Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.MessagesToClient

Class ChoseLeaderCardMessage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.MessagesToClient.MessageToClient
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.MessagesToClient.ChoseLeaderCardMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ChoseLeaderCardMessage
extends MessageToClient
ChoseLeaderCardMessage Class contains data for a response message to be sent to the client after a ChooseLeaderCard request.

Attributes:

  • RedResourceStack "temporaryResources": contains the number of resources which the player has to add to his Warehouse
See Also:
